name: Outlaws of the Old West
description: Outlaws of the Old West is a massively multiplayer survival MMO with a huge world, thousands of items and a modular building system. Survive the wild, build your own homestead, defeat villainous bandits and work with others to tame the Wild West.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD Ryzen 2400G Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660 GTX or AMD Radeon 7850 HD series DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Quad Core i7 4770K or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 GTX or AMD RX480 DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 50 GB available space
